mapper.select: select s.space_no, avg(r.rev_rate) rev_rate,space_name, count(r.mem_no) count,count(DISTINCT(FAV_NO)) favorite, s.mem_no , s.space_category,space_addr1,space_addr2, s.SPACE_INTRO1,s.SPACE_IMG1,m.mem_img from SPACE s FULL OUTER join review r on r.space_no =s.space_no FULL OUTER join MEMBER m on s.mem_no = m.mem_no FULL OUTER join FAVORITE f on s.space_no = f.space_no GROUP BY s.space_no, s.mem_no, s.space_category,space_addr1,space_addr2, s.SPACE_INTRO1,s.SPACE_IMG1,m.mem_img,s.space_name having s.space_no is not null order by space_no desc
select * from space NATURAL JOIN map

select * from (select rownum r,space_no,mem_no,space_name,space_category,space_addr1,space_addr2,space_intro1,space_intro2,space_tag,fac_no,space_site,space_img1,space_img2,space_img3, space_img4,space_img5,space_img6,space_img7,space_phone,space_cau,space_peo_count,space_open,space_close,space_sum,space_bank,space_account,space_depositor from (select space_no,mem_no,space_name,space_category,space_addr1,space_addr2,space_intro1,space_intro2,space_tag,fac_no,space_site,space_img1,space_img2,space_img3, space_img4,space_img5,space_img6,space_img7,space_phone,space_cau,space_peo_count,space_open,space_close,space_sum,space_bank,space_account,space_depositor from space where mem_no = #{mem_no} order by space_no desc )) where r >= (#{pageNumber}-1)*10+1 and r <= #{pageNumber}*10
select count(*) from space where mem_no = #{mem_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE SPACE SET SPACE_NAME=#{space_name}, SPACE_CATEGORY=#{space_category}, SPACE_ADDR1=#{space_addr1}, SPACE_ADDR2=#{space_addr2}, SPACE_INTRO1=#{space_intro1}, SPACE_INTRO2=#{space_intro2}, SPACE_TAG=#{space_tag}, FAC_NO=#{fac_no}, SPACE_SITE=#{space_site}, SPACE_IMG1=#{space_img1}, SPACE_IMG2=#{space_img2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPACE_IMG3=#{space_img3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPACE_IMG4=#{space_img4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPACE_IMG5=#{space_img5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPACE_IMG6=#{space_img6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPACE_IMG7=#{space_img7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPACE_PHONE=#{space_phone}, SPACE_CAU=#{space_cau}, SPACE_PEO_COUNT=#{space_peo_count}, SPACE_OPEN=#{space_open}, SPACE_CLOSE=#{space_close}, SPACE_SUM=#{space_sum}, SPACE_BANK=#{space_bank}, SPACE_ACCOUNT=#{space_account}, SPACE_DEPOSITOR=#{space_depositor} WHERE SPACE_NO=#{space_no}
